description:
Senior Sales Representative (Inbound)

Is This You?
• Do you love sales?
• Are you outgoing and driven to learn?
• Do you have to fully believe in the product you are offering before you can sell it?
• Are you driven to find solutions for others?
• Do you enjoy pushing people to be their best?
• Are you looking to grow constantly (personally and professionally)?
• Do you love being pushed to be your best self every single day?

At The Sponsorship Collective, we believe that sales, coaching and transformation are variations of the same process.

About the Role:

You will be responsible for conducting sales calls and building long term relationships with our clients. We will provide leads and appointments, you will show up as your best self and coach those prospects to make a buying decision.

Responsibilities:
• Convert warm inbound leads into sales
• Handle multiple prospects simultaneously
• Take scheduled calls via Alloware and Hubspot
• Attend daily sales huddles and any other trainings
• Complete end of day reports
• Consistently be on top of daily tasks and follow up calls
• Exceed sales targets
• Use a consultative sales approach

Results:
• 65K in new business monthly. This is the minimum KPI and represents 10 units
• You should expect to take 4 – 6 inbound calls per day, 5 days per week
• You will book all of your own follow ups until the deal is closed

Requirements:
• Available full time, 40 hours per week working based on EST timezone
• Excellent internet connection
• Access to a computer with a webcam and good microphone and headset
• Love people and view their success as your own
• At least two years in high ticket sales and proven ability to close $500K+ per year
• Outstanding interpersonal skills
• A strong drive for success
• Love being part of a team
• High level of comfort with working remotely

Job Type:
• 1099 Contractor
• Full-time (40 hours)

Remuneration:
• On target earning for this role range from $85,000 per year (minimum KPI) to $135,000 per year
• There is no cap on earnings

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $85,000.00 - $135,000.00 per year

Compensation package:
• Commission pay

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift

Work Location: Remote
